channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Homes Under the Hammer
channel.desc: Dion heads to the seaside town of Mablethorpe in Lincolnshire to see a detached two-bed bungalow that's seen better days. He's also in Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, to see a two-bed semi-detached house bought by two property developing brothers. Jacqui is just outside Norwich, visiting a characterful, Grade II listed cottage.
